parameter-group.description: These configuration parameters allow you to alter before a received value is used in the trigger.

parameter.name: stateTopic
parameter.label: MQTT Trigger Topic
parameter.description: An MQTT topic that this thing will subscribe to, to receive the trigger

parameter.name: transformationPattern
parameter.label: Incoming Value Transformations
parameter.description:
Applies transformations to an incoming MQTT topic value. This can be used to map the events sent by the device to common values for all devices using, e.g. the MAP transformation.
